full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 190 of 262 1901 LC8VMAX6 Rodgers - cross 1 Q. And you didn't send your pilot logbook to Ghislaine either, right? 2 A. No. 3 Q. That was your own personal logbook that you kept yourself, right? 4 A. Correct. 5 Q. So you have no reason to believe that Ghislaine was reviewing the manifests and the people who were flying on the flights, right? 6 A. No. 7 Q. And from your perspective, you have no reason to believe that Ghislaine would have known which passengers were on which flights, if she didn't fly on the flight herself, right? 8 A. That's correct. 9 Q. Okay. I want to move to a different topic, Mr. Rodgers. I want to ask you about the ownership of the planes, okay? 10 A. Okay. 11 Q. So from 1994 to 2004, you said Mr. Epstein had two primary planes, the Gulfstream and eventually the Boeing, right? 12 A. Yes. 13 Q. Those planes were owned by limited liability companies or LLCs, isn't that right? 14 A. I don't think the first plane -- are we referring to the Gulfstream or the -- 15 Q. I'm referring to the Gulfstream and the Boeing. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013468

text_blocks.content: 1 Q. And you didn't send your pilot logbook to Ghislaine either, right? 2 A. No. 3 Q. That was your own personal logbook that you kept yourself, right? 4 A. Correct. 5 Q. So you have no reason to believe that Ghislaine was reviewing the manifests and the people who were flying on the flights, right? 6 A. No. 7 Q. And from your perspective, you have no reason to believe that Ghislaine would have known which passengers were on which flights, if she didn't fly on the flight herself, right? 8 A. That's correct. 9 Q. Okay. I want to move to a different topic, Mr. Rodgers. I want to ask you about the ownership of the planes, okay? 10 A. Okay. 11 Q. So from 1994 to 2004, you said Mr. Epstein had two primary planes, the Gulfstream and eventually the Boeing, right? 12 A. Yes. 13 Q. Those planes were owned by limited liability companies or LLCs, isn't that right? 14 A. I don't think the first plane -- are we referring to the Gulfstream or the -- 15 Q. I'm referring to the Gulfstream and the Boeing.
